abstract: Editorial urges German Chancellor Angela Merkel to end her opposition to European-financed bank recapitalization that will allow the European Union to bolster its inadequate bailout fund; warns that if Europe's leaders do not come up with a more robust recovery plan, judgment of global stock and credit markets is likely to be harsh and swift.
snippet: If Europe’s leaders do not come up with a more robust plan, the judgment of global stock and credit markets is likely to be harsh and swift.
lead_paragraph: If Europe’s leaders do not come up with a more robust plan, the judgment of global stock and credit markets is likely to be harsh and swift.

headline.main: Will Mrs. Merkel Wake Up in Time?
headline.print_headline: Will Mrs. Merkel Wake Up in Time?
headline.seo: Will Angela Merkel Wake Up in Time?
